name: Wedding Dress DIY
description:
Create your very own wedding dress in this amazing bridal game!

I mean, unless you work in a bridal salon, in your entire lifetime you only get to pick a handful of wedding dresses for yourself or your besties. Not any more! In Wedding Dress DIY, you get to pick the perfect, dreamlike wedding dresses for a myriad of brides. And not just the dresses, everything that goes along with it: shoes, hairstyle, necklace, veil, bouquet, venue and more. Don't miss out playing this charming game!

BECOME THE BEST BRIDAL STYLIST!

FEATURES:
- create hundreds of unique styles
- select from a number of gowns
- choose you favorite tops
- decide which necklace fits best
- tie it all together with a choice of hairstyles and hair colors
- make sure the venue matches the style
- top it all off with a selection of flower bouquets
- and more

See if you can design the dream dress and bring joy to the bride to be!
